G

Game - Class in main
The Game class represents the main logic and user interface for the Fiery Dragons game.
Game() - Constructor for class main.Game
Constructor
Game(ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class main.Game
Constructs a new Game instance, initializing the game state and user interface.
GameComponent - Class in components
GameComponent class is an abstract class that represents all the game components of Fiery Dragons game.

GameState is a manager class to manage the saving and loading of the current game state.
